I am the person in the team driving adoption of TDD, DDD, User Stories, Metrics, Retrospectives, Lean, Kanban. I love to code, but I will go deep on understanding why a line of code needs to exist. I have a background in CS and design, worked as a freelancer, consultant and am constantly learning, sharing and mentoring.
